questions.question_text:
You are a Microsoft Teams administrator for your company.
The company creates a new Teams app named App1. A developer packages App1 as a ZIP file.
You need to ensure that App1 can be uploaded as a ZIP package to Teams.
Which Apps setting should you turn on?

choices.A: Allow side loading of external apps
choices.D: Enable new external apps by default

choices.B: Clear the browsing history and restart Internet Explorer.
choices.C: To Internet Explorer, add the following sites as trusted sites: https://admin.microsoft.com https://*.teams.microsoft.com
choices.D: To Internet Explorer, add the following sites as trusted sites: https://login.microsoftonline.com https://*.teams.microsoft.com
choices.A: Start Internet Explorer by using InPrivate Browsing.

questions.question_text:
You have a Microsoft 365 subscription.
A user experiences issues accessing Microsoft Teams from Internet Explorer. When the user attempts to sign in from Internet Explorer, the web browser enters a loop and the user is unable to sign in.
You need to resolve the issue.
What should you do?

You have a Microsoft 365 subscription.
You need to prevent users from using third-party cloud storage in Microsoft Teams.
Which settings should you configure from the Microsoft Teams & Skype for Business Admin Center?

discussion.content:
Admin center > Org-wide settings > Teams settings > Files
"Turn on or turn off file sharing and cloud file storage options for the Files tab."
